title: Volibear, what are you doing here?

embed.description: Nova Genesis Official Website. All for Nova Genesis Servers, Nova Genesis News, Nova Genesis Cheats, Nova Genesis Video and Nova Genesis Community etc. Sign up and play Nova Genesis for free now!

body: After you take a look at this link, just take a quick look at the Runeguard Volibear skin. Similar, no?

replies.body: Oh no they both have the same colour fur and the same pose. He's not even wearing armour FFS! It's likely that whoever made that art sketched over voli yes, but it's not outright copied like many other things I have seen in the past.
